item.title: [Paint] USA Paint Flasher - First Script
item.dc:creator: @Shahar_Avain Shahar Avain
item.description:
@Shahar_Avain wrote:

This is my first script All i did was look at a tutorial in microsoft word (Courtesy of Surajd) and went on from there. So here it is.

program USAPaintFlasher; {Hey guys, this is my first script, a USA Paint Flasher. Have a good time.} {READ ALL OF THIS, IMPORTANT INFORMATION} {Made by Shahar Avain} {Remember to only put the crosshair on the program bar at the top} {This is beginner, so you need to open paint and select the paint bucket.} procedure USA; begin MoveMouse(77,554); wait(50); ClickMouse(77,554,true); wait(50); MoveMouse(149,345); wait(50); ClickMouse(149,345, true); wait(50); MoveMouse(41,560); wait(50); ClickMouse(41,560,true); wait(50); MoveMouse(149,345); wait(50); ClickMouse(149,345, true); wait(50); MoveMouse(139,549); wait(50); ClickMouse(139,549,true); wait(50); MoveMouse(149,345); wait(50); ClickMouse(149,345, true); wait(50); end; begin repeat USA; until(false); End.

Read full topic
